workflow-metadata.description:
Data and Use Case

Data - Real world purchases data from the London Fire Brigade (from the London Data Store:

https://data.london.gov.uk/dataset/lfb-payments-over-f250---2022-23). The dataset has 10 columns (with useful headers) and around 6000 rows for each month's data.

Use Case - Take 3 months of data and manipulate to show overall totals and trends and VAT data and store totals by month by vendor, department and category and department and category
